summary: In ancient Bagdad, Hafiz is a beggar - self coined the King of Beggars - and a master of the slight of hand. He often likes to wander the streets late at night pretending to be a Prince, ... See full summary »
cast: Ronald Colman|Marlene Dietrich|James Craig|Edward Arnold|Hugh Herbert|Joy Page|Florence Bates|Harry Davenport|Hobart Cavanaugh|Robert Warwick|Eddie Abdo|Jimmy Ames|Morris Ankrum|Leslie Anthony|Lynn Arlen|Noble Blake|Carla Boehm|Dick Botiller|Paul Bradley|Sonia Carr|Zedra Conde|Harry Cording|Pedro de Cordoba|Billy Cummings|Peter Cusanelli|Carmen D'Antonio|Yvonne De Carlo|Walter De Palma|Anna Demetrio|Victor Dubinsky|Joyce Gates|Sachin Ghosh|Leatrice Joy Gilbert|Barbara Glenz|Gabriel Gonzales|Joseph Granby|Herman Heller|Eileen Herrick|Harry Humphrey|Charles Judels|Cy Kendall|Jack Kenny|Victor Kilian|Beatrice Kraft|Evelyne Kraft|Charles La Torre|Rosalyn Lee|Gabriel Lenoff|Mitchell Lewis|Jack 'Tiny' Lipson|Barry Macollum|Louis Manley|John Maxwell|John Merton|Charles Middleton|Frank Morgan|Phil Nazir|Julian Oliver|Nestor Paiva|Shelby Payne|Frank Penny|Frances Ramsden|Ramiro Rivas|William Rivas|John Schaller|Dan Seymour|Saul Silverman|Jessie Tai Sing|Bhogwan Singh|Paul Singh|Sammy Stein|Minerva Urecal|Dale Van Sickel|Morgan Wallace|Bruno Weise|Eve Whitney|Zack Williams|Marek Windheim|Roque Ybarra|Joe Yule
title: El príncipe mendigo
